keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map w scrollUp
map s scrollDown
map q scrollFullPageDown
map e scrollFullPageUp
map g9 lastTab
map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map H closeTabsOnLeft
map L closeTabsOnRight
map M closeOtherTabs
map c LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map u LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map v LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map U LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito 
map a scrollPageDown
map j scrollPageDown
map d scrollPageUp
map k scrollPageUp
map A scrollToLeft
map D scrollToRight
map r goBack
map R goForward
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map i Vomnibar.activate
map ` createTab window http://youdao.com/w/somatosensory/#keyfrom=dict2.top 
map p openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map P openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map m Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map ~ Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map z reload
map g8 visitPreviousTab
unmap zH
unmap zL
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
